div.p: Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die Julij anno quo supra

The said' day gilbert tulidef Sandy Donaldsone thomas straloche Richerde
redhede Donald baxtar and canny buchane be thar avin tong grant was Ilkan
of thame in Amerciament of the Court for the wantin of brede of quhet to furnis'
the toune et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum

The said day Androw gordone baxtar was conuict' be ane suorne assis' James Colisone
forspekar for the wanting of bred' to furnis' the toune

The saide day normonde leslie grauntit him aving to Dauid andirsone xxij s'
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne pule was in Amerciament of the court be his avne tong grant for the
occupeing of fremannis craft for the quhilk he was in Amerciament of the court and aw
to mend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum And the balyeis chargit the
saide Jonhne to decist tharfra quhill he compone with the denys of the gilde

The said' day Jonhne brekow grantit him dettour to Jonhne arthour for xx s'
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne puk was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' James colison'
forspekar for tribulance of Robert Kennertj and the said Robert quyt of ale tribu
lance of him for the quhilkis It was ordanit be the saide assis' that gif euire the
said' Johne committis ony tribulance to the saide Robert and beis conuict' tharof he
sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

The said' day William lindesay tuk to preiwe this day xx dais and gif it be lauchfule
and falyeing tharof the next lauchfule day thareftir follouing befor the balyeis that he has
pait tile Androw brabnire tua franche crounys

The saide day Johne Colisone follouit Andro gordone baxtar that he wranguislie and agan the
law has haldin In mair' watter' in the loche that neidfule Is throu the quhilkis
he has distroit him iiij barrellis of ber' savin' quhlkis the said Androw denyit and for waknes of
the Court the balye continevit the said' action' to friday that next Cumis

eodem die Johannes Jacobus Colisone deuenit plegius legalis per manum terras et bona
quod Willelmus lindesay erit Indempnis pro Andrea brabir aliter quam per viam Juris
et Cuthbertus Jonhnestone deuenit plegius legalis per manum terras et bona quod
dictus andreas erit Indempnis pro prefato Willelmo aliter quam per viam Juris et quelibet
dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios indempnes et cetera

Eodem die Johannes Colisone deuneit plegius legalis et cetera quod Johannes pyile erit
Indempnis pro Roberto Kennertj aliter quam per viam Juris et Andreas stratone deuenit
plegius legalis quod Robertus Kennertj erit Indempnis pro dicto Johanne piyle aliter
quam per viam Juris prefatus Robertus obligauit se ad conseruandum dictum suum plegium Inde
mpnem de huismodi fideiussione Et Joneta traile relicta quondam Jacobi Kennertj
obligauit se fidemedia per bona et terras ad conseruandum dictum Andream Indempnem de huismodi
fideiussione

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die
mensis Julij anno quo supra

head.add: plegius legalis inter Waus and Kennerty

div.p:
Eodem die Adam fif deuenit plegius legalis quod Johannes Kennerty erit Indempnis
pro roberto Waus aliter quam per viam Juris
Johannes menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod robertus Waus erit Indempnis
pro Johanne Kennerty aliter quam per viam Juris Et vtraque pars obligatur ad
conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die Johannes Kennerty conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis cullan
per assisam Jura perturbio robertj Waus in verbo Et Idem robertus pro perturbio
dictj Johannis in verbo Et alterj emendabit vt Jura volunt Et prenotacio
reperta fuit in dicto Johannj

Thomas meldrum deliuerit ser Johnne ruthirfurd' a par of siluer and querell bedis
tharof xxxvj siluer bedis and xxv querell bedis and vij gardiis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxix die mensis Julij
anno quo supra .

The saide day Duncan craik grantit him avand to Dauid andirsone j row of canuas
quhilk the balyeis chargit him to paywithin terme of law

The said' day Williame boll skippar oblist him p to pay to Dauid andirsone
ane Row of pakin canuas at the next rais' that he makis siclik as vthiris
merchandis byis that be Sufficient stuf

Curia Baliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Secundo
die mensis Augusti Anno Dominj et cetera Quingentesimo decimo

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday the sextene day of this Instant
monetht of August to Androw cullan to ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one him be gorg bissat and Katherin prat his spous that he aucht to
mak thame compt rekning and pament of the some of iiijxx merkis
scottis money for the appontment maid' betuix thame for the Renun
ciacioun' of certane croftis landis and annuell Rentis pertening tile vm
quhile thomas prat eftir the tenor of ane Instrument maid' tharapon'
and the said Androw aucht to pay thame sayfar as thai want to the
said' Some and gif Compt and Rekning tharof and wrangis and he
do It nocht et cetera

The said day comperit ser thomas Bynne chaplane of sanct michaelis
alter within the paris' kirk of the said burgh' situat' And schew how he was
vnder process' of suspensioun' be my lord abirdenis lettrez' for the haldin
of certane pundis takin be him of ane lannd' pertening to Johnne
andersone fra Dauid bannerand tennand' of the samyn for the samyn in de
falt of certane annuell awing to him and vnpait that is to say thre
platis thre dischis thre poyntis tua pannys and ane chandelar
Quhilk pundis the said ser thomas broucht and present within the tolbutht
of the said' burgh' befor the bailyeis sittand' In iugment And offerit
tham reddy to be deliuerit to the said Dauid or ony vtheris haf
fand' richt tharto thai payand' him xiij s' iiij d' eftir the tenour of my
lord Aberdenis lttrez' direct' tharapone And becaus the said Dauid nor nane
vtheris comperit to ressaue the said wescheall and pay the said money
he deliuerit the said weschall and put thame in ferme keping within the said
tolbutht quhilk ar reddy to the said Dauid quhat tyme he cum and requyr
the samyn and pay the said xiij s' iiij d'

The said day georg bisset in lunger follouit Androu Cullane
burges of the said burgh' that he had gretlie tribulit him in the mastirfull
and wranguis' takin fra him of ane writ contening ane borgh' et cetera quhilk the
said Androu denyit and thareftir with consent of baitht the said partiis
the said actioun' was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' of thir personis
that is to say ser Johnne ruthirfurd knycht Androu fif patry reid' Duncan fif
Johne craik Johnne brabner Robert hill alexander burnat Dauid Cristy
alexander nory Wilyeame lindesay Johne malisone and alexander buk
quhilkis riplie auisit the richtis ressonis and allegacionis witnes and
previs of baitht the said partiis herd sene considerit and vnderstandin
fand' and deliuerit be the moutht of the said ser Johnne ruthirfurd'
forspekar of the said assis' the said Androw cullan' quyt of all tribulance
of the said georg

The saide day Jonhne of myln' lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit
to preiwe that the minister of the trinite place of abirdene hed' gevin to him
day to mertimes nixt hereftir to pay him the Some of xxxvj s' for ane hors
optenit in the actis of the buk obefor tharfor the Court wardit and
schew for law that the said Johne falyeit in his preiwe and awe to pay
the said' Some to the saide minister

The saide day Williame lindesay grauntit him to pay to Johne brabnire iij s'
of annuele of the Witsonday terme bigane

The said' day the balyeis assignit monunday that next Cumis tile Jonhne
malisone tile ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be Johne for the craik
wranguis' withhaldin fra him of Sex li' and v s' scottis money

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The saide day marioune Duncansone sister and ayr tile vmquhile Jonhne
Duncansone burges of the saide burghe' and george talyour hir spous
was oblist and suorne the gret bodelie aithe the halie ewangelis expremit
that thai sulde Infeft Jonhne arthour burges of the saide burghe be chartir
sesin and possession' in the sikerast wis' cane be diuisit in thar forlande
with the pertinence pertening to the saide marion' in heretage liand' in the vuir
kirkgat als' sone in continent the said' marion' happinnis to be put in
lauchfule Sesin tharof be the letter of Sesin of the kingis chapele
and Seile the chartir tharapon' with bath thar selis Ande the saide Jonhne
sale pay to thame at the said' Sesin gevin Nyntene merkis and aucht
Schillingis scottis money restand' vnpait of the said' lande and
the saide george and marioun' sale do ale thar diligence and labour to caus' the
breif of Inquest Impetrat' or to be Inpetrat' In the nayme of the saide
marion anent the said forland be seruit and folloue and persew the seruing of the
samyn quhen euir thai be requerit be the said Jonhe arthour

The said' day Alexander King grauntit him avand' ane franche crovne
to Duncan crak and Alexander malisone quhilkis the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem nono die mensis Augusti
anno quo supra

Eodem die Comeprtum fuit per Johannem cullane Andream Cullane Jacobum Colisone alexandrum
gray Dauid Andirsone Johannem andirsone Richardum Waus Duncanum Colisone
Johannem murray patricium rede Duncanum fif Johannem arthour Robertum Kennertj thomam crafurd'
et alexandrum Kintor burgenses dicti burgi electum et Juratam super legittima Inquisicionem quod Robertus lyle
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Richardi hile patris suj

The said' day Jonhne Kennertj denyit the maile askit be Johne of murray and grantit to
fulfile the appontment maid' betuix thame be the avis' of gilbert menyeis prouost

The saide day the balyeis chargit Alexander King to deliuer ane barrele of tar to patry
Red' be his avne toung grant within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne malisone lauchfullie Callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer to the
borghe fundin one him be Johne Crak for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of sex
li' and v s' tharfor the balyeis chargit William scrimgeour sergeand' to tak ane distres of
the said' Johnez' and lat it agan to borghe' and it be askit and warne him to comper on
monunday that next Cumis and ansuer to the saide borghe

The saide Jonhne Cuk sergeand' was quyt of tribulance of Richard' litstar be ane
suorne assis' Johne Cullan forspekar

The saide day charlis stevinsone Come Souerte to Jonhne Colisone balye to do
to

The saide day the prouost balyeis and diuers' of the Counsale present for the tyme grantit
and ordanit to gif ane govne to Robert murray sangstar for his gude seruice done and to be don'
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The said' day Jonhne litstar resauit xxtj li' of golde and quhit money fra Jonhne of Cullan
and deliurit him the Indentur' and the Copy of it Anent the lande quhar' the said Jonhne
litstaris duellis liand in the gallougat

The said' day Jonhne Cullane grantit ane yeris tak of the lande quhilk Johne
litstar Induellis for ane yer' for the male paing to the said Johne Cullan

The saide day Jonhe' malisone and Alexander buk grantit that thai hede resauit sex li' and v s'
scottis money of Jonhne Crakis quhilkis Androw nachtj sergeand at commavnd of the balyeis
chargit be his wande of office to remane within the tolbutht quhile thai pait the saide
money to the saide Jonhne crak

The saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to Jonhne litstar tile ansuer to the
borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne Cullan for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xxxij li'
and x s' for the maile of his lane liand' in the gallougat quhar he duellis and discernit the
Copy of the saide burg borghe to the said Johne litstar One his expens'

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next Cumis to androw litstar tile
ansuer to the borghe fundin one him for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of x li' g'
g'

The said' day Jonhne Malisone and Alexander buk offerit ane golde Ring to Norman leslie
Officiar' to be prisit for the vj li' and v s' avin to Jonhne Crak to perofferit to deliuer
mair' gudis gif the said ring extendis nocht to the availe of the said' money

The said' day Anny Scherar' warnit and nocht comperit tile ansuer to Jonhne brabnire
for ane part of gudis of airschipe pertening to him

Eodem die matheus branche deuenit plegius legalis quos Johannes mar' talyour
erit Indempnis pro Johanne Pyile aliter quam per viam Juris Et Andreas fif
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes pyile erit Indempnis pro dicto Johanne
mar' aliter quam per viam Juris et quelibet dictarum partem obligatur ad conseruandum
dictos plegios Indempnes de huismodi fideiussione

The said' day Dauid andirsone complenyet that thome Pyile had tribulit
him quhilk the saide thomas denyit In continent thareftir the said action'
was put to the decisioun' of thir personis that is to say Johne of Cullan Androw
fif thomas Wode mathou branche Richerd Waus Duncan fif Androw litster
Johne of murray Jonhne Crak Johne andirsone Cuthbert Jonesone Johne murray
yongar Robert hile Johne Colisone Syme ellone Johne malisone Dauid mar'
yongar Robert Kennertj and Johne mar' Dis' quhilkis suorne the gret bodely aithe
in ane assis' the richtis resonis allegacionis witnes and preuis of bath the said partiis
herde seyne and vndirstandin ale in ane voce concordand deliuerit be the moutht of
the saide Johne Cullan forspekar of the said assis' that thai coud' nocht acquit the
said thomas Pyile of the tribulance of the said Dauid andirsone for the quhilkis
he was in Amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amend as law wile and forber' in tym'
to Cum and that was gevin for dome be the moutht of William fynne dempstar
of the said court Ande the said' Dauid quyt of ale trubulance of the said thomas
And the said assis' ordanit the said thomas to be put in the goif and his knyf in his
hand at the wile of the said' Dauid Ande referrit the remanent of the amendis
to be considerit be the prouest and Consale one friday that next Cumis'

The saide day Jonhne allanson' flessour oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to deliuer
and gif tile Androu bavne skynner burges of the saide burghe ale slauchtir
skinnis of Wedris and vthir scheip skinnis that he happinnis to slay betuix
this and michaelemes' next hereftir follouing the said Androw payand' him for Ilkan
skyne vj d' tharof resauit xxiiij s' of redy money in hand in onwartis
of the saide penny worthtis

The saide day the balyeis chargit patry rede Jonhne Crak et mathou
branche to remane within the tolbutht quhile thai content and pait Symon'
elloun' the Rest of iiiixx pec' of woll

Curia balliuorum burgi de aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimosexto die
mensis augusti anno quo Supra

Eodem die thomas pyill per confessionem sue proprie lingue amerciator pro
contemptu balliuorum dicti burgi et curie exeundo de curia satisfactione et
emenda sibi adiudicatis pro perturba Dauid andirsone

The saide day androue cullane lachfullie varnit callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' to the borche fundyne one hyme be george bissat and Katryne
prat his spous' fore the wranguis' vithhaldine fra thaim of iiijxx of merkis et cetera
to compt rekninge and payment eftir ther tennour of the act' maid' tharapone of befor'
Tharfore the bailyeis chargit villiem scrimgeour officiar' to pas and tak ane
stres of the Saide Androue and lat It again to borghe and It be askit and varn'
hyme to comper' this day xv dais to ansuer' to the said' borghe as secund'
day of proces'

Eodem die Katerina prat fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit georgium
bissat sponsum Suum / suum legittimum et indubitatum procuratorem actorem et fac
torem dans et concedens eidem suam legttimam integram potestatem ad prosequendum
et calumpniandum honorabilem virum andream cullane pro inisuta detencione octoginta
marcarum ab eo et ceter agendum defendendum et prosequendum dictum andream et cetera promit
tens de rato et grato in vberiori forma procuratorij cum ceteris teris necessariis et
oportunis

The saide day the prouest bailyeis and diuers' of the counsale and communite present
fore the tym' grantit to pay Dauid' andirsone thre pundis auchtene s'
vij d' and ob' quhilkis he expendit in the townis vs' at the aldirman and
townis commavnd'

The Said' day patrik Rede Mathoue branche and Johne' crak oblist
thaim be the fathis in thar bodiis to content ande pay to Symound' ellon'
aucht stanis of woll equalie betuix thaim of the rest of iiijxx of stanis
of woll optenit one thaim and thar complecis vithin xv dais thareftir Ande
the said' symound' dischargit the prouest and bailyeis of our souerane lordis lettrez' direkit to tham
tharapone

The Said' day It vas fundyne be the prouest bailyeis and the court that the claitht
presentit in Jugment be Androue meldrum quhilk he allegit sald' to villiem
scrymgeour for holland' clath was lawne and na holland' claitht

The saide day It was deliuerit and ordanit be the prouest balyeis and Counsel that
thomas pyile for the offence done be him to Dauid andirsone and Jonhne
of mar' balye that he sale be put in the goif and ane knyf in his hand thar to
stand at the wile of the said Dauid and sale ask him forgiwnes in the Court on'
his kneys And' thareftir sale Cum one sonday that next Cumis in tyme of
the hie mes' and Syt done one his kneys and ask the said Dauid forgiwnes'
and gif euire the said' thomas happinnis eftiruart to ony tribulance or oppin
falt to the said Dauid or ony vthir honest man of the toune he salbe bannist
and expellit out of the toune And for the offence done to the said Johne mar'
balye he sale Syt done one his kneys in the Court and ask him forgivnes and besek
the hale Court to forgiwe him And thareftir salbe put in the goif thar to stand at
the wile of the said' bailye In part of recompens' of the said demeritis

Curia Balliuorum de aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimonono
die mensis Augustj Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo decimo

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to androw litster to
ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne andersoun' for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of tene pundis grettis as law will

The said day ser Johnne stirueling and ser Thomas Bynne perofferit
the pundis to Johnne smyth younger takin be the said ser thomas fra Dauid
bannemran for certane annuell aucht to the said ser thomas that is to say thre
pewtir platis iij dischis thre poyntis tua pannis and ane chandelar
the said Johnne payand' ane merk of siluer eftir the tenour of my lord aberdenis
lettrez rasit tharapon' quhilkis the said Johnne refusit to tak or ressaue And'
allegead' the said ser thomas had ane pot and a quart mar' of the said Dauidis and'
atour ormond' lesly officiar deponit the gret bodelie aitht he tuk nor apprisit
namar pundis of the said' Dauidis bannerman except the forsaid' pundis contenit in
the process' of apprising

Curia balliuorum burge de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis Augusti
anno quo supra

The saide day Jacob franchman with Duncane Colisone his forspekar lamentablie complen
that Wiliam brechene thome logane had' Cumin one him inuadit him and Cruely hurt
him and dravin blud of him throwe the quhilkis thai hed gretlie tribulit him
besekand the balye of Remed of law And in continent the said William and thomas
accusit tharapone denyit the said tribulance offering thame tile vndirlie the decision'
of ane assis' and complenyeit that the said Jacob hed tribulit the said Williame
quhilk he denyit Ande thareftir with Consent and assent of batht the said partiis thir personis
eftir writin that is to say sere Johne ruthirfurde knicht Johne Cullane James Colisone thomas
Waus Dauid andirsone Johne arthour charlis Stevinsone William futhes Duncane
fif Johne craik Johne murray patry chernsid' gavane murray Dauid fynne Richard'
Waus thome Watsone Johne malisone Dauid Kintor Androw lousone Dauid Mar' yongar
Alexander burnat William abirdour Duncane Craik burges of the said burghe was chosin and
Suorne in ane assis' quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aithez' Suorne the richtis re
sonnis allegacionis witnes and preuis of batht the said partiis herd seyn' and vndir
standin deliuerit and fand that thai couth' nocht acquit the said William brechene of
tribulance of the said Jacob franchman first in the foryvat of the nethir fory of the
wattir of Dee for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the court and ave tile amend' as
law wile and fober' in tyme to Cum et cetera And atour thai deliuerit that thai coutht nocht
acquit the said William of tribulance to the said Jacob this Instant day within
the tolbutht of abirdene for the quhilk he was in Amerciament of the court and tile Amend'
aw as law et cetera and forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera And atour thai fand' and deliuerit
that thai couthe nocht acquit the said thomas logane of tribulance of the saide
Jacob for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the Court and tile amend' as law
wile and forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera And the said Jacob was conuict' be
the said assis' for lycht tribulance of the said Williame for the quhilkis
he was in Amerciament of the court and tile amend' as law wile and et cetera And
atour thai fand' the prouocacioun' of the saide tribulance in the said' William
brechene for the quhilkis It was ordanit ande deliuerit be the said
assis' that balye sale ger' the said personis be Seueralie kepit in the tolbutht
quhile thai set sikir Souerte to the officiaris tile Cum and vndirlie the law for
the said Jacob and he happin' to deces' throw the said tribulance And gif
he lyvis for Amendis to be maid' to the partj and to recompens' the skath
costis and skathis and expens' ande to find' law borrouis that the said'
Jacob salbe skathles of thame

The said' day Robert hile come Souerte that William bole sale ansuer tile
Androw Waus in ale thingis that he hed to say to him And alexander malison'
Come Souerte that Androw Waus sale ansuer to the said William in ale
thingis he had to say to him

The saide day thome Ridale Was in Amerciament of the court in defalt of presence
becaus' the officiaris warnit him and he comperit nocht
